item.title: My Hygge Corner
item.description: Sample screenshot Source code Download How to Run What is Hygge? hygge, n. a quality of cosiness and comfortable conviviality that engenders a feeling of contentment or wellbeing (regarded as a defining characteristic of Danish culture) Hygge can mean different things to different people. My interpretation of hygge is a more social take. To me, hygge is sharing special memories with the people you love in a space that is safe, comfortable, and welcoming.

item.title: 360 Star Gazing
item.description: Sample screenshot Source code Download How to Run The “Problem” When was the last time you looked up at the stars? If you’re like me and live in a big city, you might not even remember when the last time you could properly see a star that wasn’t the sun.

item.title: I Ring You
item.description: Source code Download How to Run The “Problem” In this day and age, instant communication is a given. This makes long distance relationships more feasible. However, pulling out a phone or your web browser to log onto Facebook isnâ€™t suitable for all situations when you want to send a quick message to your significant other.

item.title: Kowther's Turtle Button
item.description: Source code Download How to Run The “Problem” The goal of this project was to design a button that would delight its user and respect some aspects of their personality. In this case, the user was a fellow classmate of mine, Kowther.
